sub_title: External Affairs Officer at The World Bank
summary: 16 years of extensive experience in strategic communications, media production and media relations; preparing and implementing communication strategies and public messages. Extensive experience in shaping targeted communication campaigns and content production in their successful delivery, including organizing public events.
